title: Rune page purchase on the 20/01/2015
body:
I'm not sure of the policy around this, but I'm just wondering if I could get an IP refund for my Rune page purchase on the 20th of January this year so i can purchase the 2 for 1 at the same price? Or am I able to get my order changed to that? It would be greatly appreciated because I had no idea if I waited another 4 days I would have had another rune page for the same price.

Thanks for your time!

replies.body: Wasn't the announcement made *well* before that date?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Gar0zrEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-24T23:46:18.874+0000)
>
> Wasn't the announcement made *well* before that date?

Possibly? Although I thought they made the announcement of the RP sales well before the date, I don't remember reading about rune page sales.

Okay, I had a look through the website. The announcement for the double rune pages is [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/2015-season-kickoff-sale). It was posted on the day it came out. My bad on that part, I got it confused with the RP sale.

You should be eligible for the extra page then, if you send in a support ticket and ask them nicely. Keep some screen-shots proving the purchase handy.

Best of luck.
